example: I cook dinner in the kitchen.
example_es: Cocino la cena en la cocina.

example: My bedroom is upstairs.
The bathroom is next to the kitchen.
example_es: El baño está al lado de la cocina.

example: We watch TV in the living room.
example_es: Vemos televisión en la sala de estar.

example: We eat dinner in the dining room.
The car is in the garage.
example_es: El coche está en el garaje.

example: We have flowers in our garden.
The basement is very cold.
We store old things in the attic.
example_es: Guardamos cosas viejas en el ático.

example: I like to sit on the balcony.
example_es: Me gusta sentarme en el balcón.

example: Be careful on the stairs.
Please close the door.
Open the window for fresh air.
example_es: Abre la ventana para aire fresco.

example: The roof needs repair.
The wall is painted blue.
example_es: La pared está pintada de azul.

example: The floor is made of wood.
There's a fan on the ceiling.
example_es: Hay un ventilador en el techo.

example: We bought new furniture.
The sofa is very comfortable.
Please sit on this chair.
example_es: Por favor siéntate en esta silla.

example: The table is in the dining room.
example_es: La mesa está en el comedor.

example: I sleep in my bed.
My clothes are in the closet.
example_es: Mi ropa está en el armario.

example: The milk is in the refrigerator.
example_es: La leche está en el refrigerador.

example: I cook on the stove.
The cake is in the oven.
example_es: El pastel está en el horno.

example: Wash the dishes in the sink.
example_es: Lava los platos en el fregadero.

example: I take a shower every morning.
The children play in the bathtub.
example_es: Los niños juegan en la bañera.

example: I look at myself in the mirror.
Turn on the lamp, please.
The curtains are blue.
There's a carpet in the living room.
example_es: Hay una alfombra en la sala de estar.

example: We watch television after dinner.
The telephone is ringing.
Turn on the air conditioning.
The heating is not working.
We have no electricity today.
The plumbing needs to be fixed.
I lost my house key.
example_es: Perdí la llave de mi casa.
